thread.title: EFolder Announces Silver Sponsorship of SpiceWorld Austin 2015
thread.title_full: EFolder Announces Silver Sponsorship of SpiceWorld Austin 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: EFolder Announces Silver Sponsorship of SpiceWorld Austin 2015
text:
eFolder to Showcase Cloud-to-Cloud Backup Solution to 1000 IT Professionals
Austin, Texas
eFolder , a leading supplier of business continuity, cloud data protection and cloud file sync solutions, today announced that it is a Silver Sponsor of SpiceWorld 2015 in Austin, Texas, from September 23-25. Conference goers will have the opportunity to visit eFolder at booth 33 to learn more about eFolder Cloudfinder, the company’s cloud-to-cloud backup solution for Salesforce, Office 365, Google Apps and Box.
SpiceWorld is an annual IT conference hosted by Spiceworks that connects IT professionals, channel partners and IT vendors. The conference consist of upwards of 1000 IT decision makers from a variety of industries including manufacturing, healthcare, non-profit, education, government and finance. eFolder will be showcasing eFolder Cloudfinder, a cloud-to-cloud backup solution that helps IT administrators and IT service providers backup, search and recover SaaS application data.
Cloudfinder is the most comprehensive cloud-to-cloud backup solution on the market, providing backup, instant full-text search, and restore capabilities for cloud applications, including Salesforce, Office 365, Google Apps and Box. Cloudfinder’s unified interface lets administrators search for and recover data across multiple cloud applications and users. Organizations using Cloudfinder can rest assured that their cloud application data is searchable and recoverable in the event of data loss.
“eFolder is excited to be a silver sponsor of SpiceWorld 2015 and connect with the Spiceworks network, one of the most progressive IT communities,” says Ted Hulsy, vice president of marketing at eFolder. “Members of Spiceworks, IT administrators and service providers are collectively ushering in a new era of cloud applications. With eFolder Cloudfinder, we are able to help support the objectives of businesses that choose to move to the cloud by ensuring that their cloud application data is protected, no matter where it resides.”
Attendees can receive a demonstration of eFolder Cloudfinder by visiting eFolder at booth 33.
To get the latest news and updates during the event, attendees can engage with eFolder on Twitter: @eFolder Instagram: @eFolder and Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/efolder .
About eFolder
eFolder is a leading supplier of cloud data protection, business continuity, and cloud file sync solutions for MSPs, solution providers, and VARs. Delivered as wholesale services to the channel, eFolder enables its partners to provide branded data protection and file sync services and to generate highly profitable, recurring revenue. eFolder services complement many of the managed service offerings already deployed by partners and integrate with common PSA systems, making adoption of eFolder services fast and easy. eFolder also empowers cost-effective partner and end-user private clouds, allowing partners to meet the needs of any client, regardless of size or readiness to engage in public cloud services. eFolder is a privately held company and is headquartered in Atlanta, GA. For more information, please visit: http://www.efolder.net and follow us on Twitter: @eFolder
